remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113, 2nd paragraph on p. 114. ` C ` represents s_1.  In their notation, we prove p ` \/ ` s_1 = p ` \/ ` s.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-2012.)
statement:
cdleme8.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme8.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme8.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme8.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme8.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme8.4 $e |- C = ( ( P .\/ S ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme8 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ S e. A ) -> ( P .\/ C ) = ( P .\/ S ) ) $.
